alert.note: Alert for Cass; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:47AM EST until January 27 at 10:26PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Eel River at North Manchester affecting Miami, Kosciusko, Cass IN, Wabash and Whitley Counties. .Rises on area rivers occurred as a result of recent snowmelt and last night`s rain. For the Eel River...including North Manchester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Eel River at North Manchester. * WHEN...From this morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The river is at flood stage, minor agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 11.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM EST.
